mechanisms.title: Socket Head Cap Screw Mount
mechanisms.summary: Cap screw seating with clearance and head pocket.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create a screw mounting feature with through clearance, optional counterbore for head seating, and boss support. Keep screw size, clearance class, and seat depth parametric.

mechanisms.title: Countersunk Screw Seat
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate countersunk screw holes with top angle and seat diameter controlled by parameters. Keep pilot/clearance size and countersink depth explicit.

mechanisms.title: Hex Nut Capture Pocket
mechanisms.summary: Hex pocket for captive nut retention.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create a hexagonal nut pocket with insertion chamfer and anti-rotation flats. Keep nut size, depth, and clearance configurable for printability.

mechanisms.title: Square Nut Capture Pocket
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate a square nut pocket with anti-pullout shoulder and insertion lead-in. Parameterize nut size, pocket depth, and side clearance.

mechanisms.title: Heat-Set Insert Receptacle
mechanisms.summary: Thermal insert receptacle with lead-in chamfer.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build a receptacle for brass heat-set inserts with insertion lead, anti-crack wall thickness, and shoulder stop. Keep bore and boss geometry parametric.

mechanisms.title: Plain Washer Landing
mechanisms.summary: Flat seating land for washer-supported joints.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create planar washer landing pads with optional recess and chamfered transition. Keep washer OD/ID references and edge offset parametric.

mechanisms.title: Deep Groove Bearing Seat
mechanisms.summary: Press-fit/clearance seat for deep groove ball bearing.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create bearing seat geometry with chamfered entry, shoulder stop, and fit tolerance. Parameterize seat diameter delta, depth, and shoulder width.

mechanisms.title: Tapered Roller Bearing Seat
mechanisms.summary: Seat stack for tapered roller bearing integration.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build tapered roller bearing seat with axial retention shoulder and preload spacer allowance. Keep cone/cup fits and spacing as named parameters.

mechanisms.title: ISO External Thread Stub
mechanisms.summary: Parametric external ISO thread-ready shaft stub.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create an external-thread-ready stub including runout relief, lead chamfer, and thread length control. Keep major diameter, pitch, and class clearance parameterized.

mechanisms.title: ISO Internal Thread Stub
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build an internal-thread-ready bore with lead-in chamfer and tap drill guidance dimensions. Keep minor diameter, pitch, and thread depth as parameters.

mechanisms.title: ACME Thread Stub
mechanisms.summary: Lead-screw compatible ACME thread stub geometry.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate a thread-ready ACME screw or nut stub with flank angle assumptions and root/crest control. Keep pitch, nominal size, and engagement length parametric.

mechanisms.title: Pillow Block Bearing Mount
mechanisms.summary: Bearing pocket with bolt pattern for pillow-block style supports.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create a pillow-block mount with bearing pocket, support walls, and bolt holes. Keep pocket diameter, base width, and bolt spacing fully parametric.
